EmailTemplate.subject: Batch {!FileBatch__c.Name} payment request approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
This email is to notify you that Batch {!FileBatch__c.Name} for {!FileBatch__c.RecordType} pathway has been approved by the award creator and awards in UtahGrants and FINET have been created/amended.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the Utah Grants Support Team at utahgrants.support@reisystems.com, if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
UtahGrants Support Team
utahgrants.support@reisystems.com
Ph. No. 703.480.9100
